name: CONTORTION
description:
https://ibgames.itch.io/contortion/devlog/80398/we-are-taking-in-questions

In visions of the dark nightI have dreamed of joy departed—But a waking dream of life and lightHath left me broken-hearted.
Ah! what is not a dream by dayTo him whose eyes are castOn things around him with a rayTurned back upon the past?
That holy dream—that holy dream,While all the world were chiding,Hath cheered me as a lovely beamA lonely spirit guiding.
What though that light, thro' storm and night,So trembled from afar—What could there be more purely brightIn Truth's day-star?

The story behind this project is that, the team was exhausted due to a tight development schedule and wanted to focus on something different. So keeping that in mind; the team collaborated with the head writer. Within a week of putting things together born the "Contortion"

We will soon discuss everything regarding the project like how things came together in our Weekly podcast; if you wish to know more keep an eye out for one of our podcast every Sunday:
